comment: Thanks for the invite. Im pretty new on gab so Im still trying to get used to the lay out. Im a Scottish unionist, which means I support a United Kingdom. Im considered to be an evil Tory and I despise Scottish nationalism. Oh and Im not a fan of liberal lefties
amr:
# ::snt Thanks for the invite. Im pretty new on gab so Im still trying to get used to the lay out. Im a Scottish unionist, which means I support a United Kingdom. Im considered to be an evil Tory and I despise Scottish nationalism. Oh and Im not a fan of liberal lefties
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (ii2 / invite-01
                  :ARG1 y))
      :snt2 (n / new-02
            :ARG1 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG2 (p / product
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :degree (p2 / pretty)
            :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / try-01
                        :ARG0 ii3
                        :ARG1 (g / get-03
                              :ARG1 ii3
                              :ARG2 (u / use-02
                                    :ARG0 ii3
                                    :ARG1 (l / lay-out-02)))
                        :mod (s / still))))
      :snt3 (m2 / mean-01
            :ARG1 (u2 / unionist
                  :domain (ii4 / i)
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Scotland")))
            :ARG2 (s2 / support-01
                  :ARG0 ii4
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "United"
                              :op2 "Kingdom"))))
      :snt4 (a / and
            :op1 (c4 / consider-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :mod (e / evil)
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Conservative"
                                          :op2 "Party")))))
            :op2 (d / despise-01
                  :ARG0 ii4
                  :ARG1 (n6 / nationalism
                        :mod c2)))
      :snt5 (f / fan
            :polarity -
            :domain ii4
            :topic (p5 / person
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / left-19)
                  :ARG1-of (l3 / liberal-02)))
      :mod (o / oh))

# ::snt Welcome, fellow Sane Person.
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (w / welcome-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :mod (f / fellow)
                  :mod (s2 / sane)
                  :ARG2-of s)))
